headline: Trump Repudiates Claims In Former Adviser’s Book
abstract: Hours after an article described an unpublished manuscript by his former national security adviser, President Trump rejected John Bolton’s account.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Trump on Monday pushed back on a firsthand account from his former national security adviser, John R. Bolton, about tying military aid for a foreign ally to his own personal agenda, as senators consider the president’s future in the Oval Office.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
